targets.query: SELECT last(*) FROM "process" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT 100*count("idle")-sum("idle")  FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

alert.name: [{{ item.value.dbname }}] Received / Send dropped network packets

targets.query: SELECT last("node_state") FROM "database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "node_name"

SELECT mean("point_value") FROM "database_history" WHERE ("request_label" != 'PERFORMANCE_AGENT' AND ("request_duration_ms" > 100 OR "is_executing" = true)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "request_label"
SELECT (100*count("idle")-sum("idle"))/100 FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host" fill(null)

SELECT count("point_type") FROM "database_history" WHERE ("request_label" != 'PERFORMANCE_AGENT' AND (("is_executing"=true AND "request_duration_ms" = 0)  OR "request_duration_ms" > 100)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1ms), "transaction_id", "request_label", "request_id" fill(none)

SELECT "transaction_id", "request_id", "request", "request_label", "request_duration_ms","success", "is_executing", "error_count" FROM "database_history" WHERE ("point_type" = 'start' AND "request_label" != 'PERFORMANCE_AGENT' AND (("is_executing"=true  AND "request_duration_ms" = 0)  OR "request_duration_ms" > 100)) AND $timeFilter
